title: Club tag doesnt show
body: I created a club for my ranked 5s team we have 5 and it will not show. I have the box checked that says show club name so I dont know what else to do

replies.body: Does this happen to anyone else in your club? Does this also happen if you join another club and try to rep that tag?
Idk what happened but its working now lol Thanks though. I twas happening to my whole club

Hello,
Do you have special characters in the tag? Safer not to as it can create visual bug.
Simpler to contact Player Support and provide details/screenshots. 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
